# Introduction

In this workshop we bla bla. With *H. sapiens*.

We work from [this site](www.jeffareslab.org).

# Setting up

First we load **the tidyverse**.

```{r}
#| echo: true
#| output: false
library(tidyverse)
```

Then we load some data:

```{r}
#| output: false
#| echo: true

cells <-read_tsv(url("https://djeffares.github.io/data/BIO00066I/all-cell-data-FFT.tsv"))
```

# Plotting

## First plot

Then we make a plot:

```{r}
#| output: false

ggplot(cells, aes(x=clone, y= volume))+
    geom_violin()
```
